metadata.title: CVE-2015-3205 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: libmimedir allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a VCF filewith two NULL bytes at the end of the file, related to "free" functioncalls in the "lexer's memory clean-up procedure."

criterions.comment: libmimedir: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
